WorkItem.ClosedComment: T8 issue is duplicate of Issue 13871
WorkItem.Description:
hey, my boyfriend plays a mage and loves this program, but for priests it just seems to have a number of issues and always get answered by 'its not put in yet, or fixed yet' or something along those lines. I understand that it takes time, and that iwouldnt be able to do it. I just want to know if this will be a program i will ever be able to use. it just makes me sad when mages get set bonuses updated like right around patch day, and we are on the next set of loot and the t8 stuff hasnt been put in yet. 
thank you for your time

Comments.Message: The reason for not immediately implementing t8 4 part is that the underlying code for spriest currently has issues with haste. Toss in the added haste from 4pt8, and things get really nasty. I really haven't gotten around to making this work without issues.
